column4: I'm running 7.10 on i386. My Update Manager is offering to upgrade me to '8.04 LTS'. Is upgrading this way as risky as this kinda' thing used to be? Or should i just back up what i need, and reinstall all from scratch?
it should be fine if your make a tinfoil hat and wear it during the process
i did it everything went fine
Guess i'll do the backup, then give it a try. Thanks.
